# IJsonBoxClient.DeleteAsync method

Delete a record.

```csharp
public Task<string> DeleteAsync(string id)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| id | The ID of the record to delete. |

## Return Value

A status message as a JSON object.
